professional_summary: Creative and data-driven Marketing Manager with 5+ years of experience in digital marketing, brand strategy, and customer engagement. Passionate about driving business growth through innovative campaigns and data analytics.

Managed an annual marketing budget of $500K, optimizing ROI.

description: Increased social media engagement by 120% through targeted campaigns.
Implemented an influencer marketing strategy, leading to a 35% increase in conversions.

description: Improved website ranking, achieving a 200% increase in organic traffic.
